review.comment: The Richardson law firm is outstanding! From their courteous and efficient office staff to their knowledgeable lawyers. Both in accident injury and criminal disputes, we were lucky to have them represent our family. Their kindness and compassion were surpassed only by their outstanding results.

This is the best law firm i highly recommend anyone with traffic volitions to hit them up ASAP !!!!
Melissa was the best over the phone always answering her calls made me feel really good about everything in the matter of days I had the news I wanted.
I’m telling u y’all won’t regret coming to them for the service u need. Don’t waste time looking around hit them up ASAP and get it going

It has been an incredible experience. I dismissed my charges very quickly and cleanly. I did not have to say anything in court. Patrick did everything and Melissa has been very good with her work. It is also impressive. I recommend it 100%

(Translated by Google) Excellent legal representation from the lawyers, they speak Spanish for Latin people who need it….I really recommend them!! 👍🏼

Excellent legal representation from the lawyers, they speak Spanish for Latino people who need it... I really recommend them!! 👍🏼

(Original)
Excelente representación legal de parte de los abogados,hablan español para gente latina que lo necesite….verdaderamente los recomiendo!! 👍🏼

Excellent legal representation from the lawyers, they speak Spanish for Latino people who need it... I really recommend them!! 👍🏼
Outstanding service, and customer experience. Professional, expedient, and I am grateful.
Took care of my traffic violations in less than a week,  very prompt and efficient service 👍🏾👍🏾
Patrick Anstead and Daniela Campos were very good at helping me get my disability benefits. Highly recommended.
I received exceptional service for my personal injury case!  Matt & Codia are awesome!
Great experience with this firm. Experienced, professional, responsive attorneys. Highly recommend!

I highly recommend this firm if you're looking for an attorney in Cumberland County. My traffic matter was handled within one week of receiving my citation. You just cannot beat that. Attorney Patrick Anstead is really good at his job and Melissa is very kind over the phone. They were able to put my mind at ease and handled my matter promptly, professionally, and at an affordable rate. Other attorneys I contacted in the area had quoted me over double what The Richardson Firm quoted me. I cannot recommend these people enough.
Ms Melissa and the whole firm helped me in an emergency with ease! All through emails and phone calls! Thank you!

If you are looking for an Attorney for handling  Military reasons for your loved one, I Highly recommend The Richardson Law Firm. I cannot not thank Attorney Kris Poppe and staff enough for handling matters for my son. May my review show my forever gratitude and let others know if they have any doubt about working with this Firm please rest assure you are in good hands.  Though I live all the way in California I was completely comfortable knowing an amazing team was behind and backing my son while keeping me informed and answering any questions that I had with compassion and professionalism.

Thank you Forever
Elaine M

Attorney Kris Poppe and military paralegal Ms. Jacobs were professional and supportive throughout my 1+ years of working with the Richardson Law Firm.  I always felt I was their first priority and my questions and concerns were immediately addressed. I would happily work with Mr. Poppe again on military matters.

After explaining the details of my court case with Attorney Britt, he pointed out the complexity of the case with competent knowledge and clarity. Throughout several court appearances due to Covid-19 pandemic, Attorney Britt remained calm and professional as he proceeded with legal matters at hand, thus, keeping me informed before and during court appearances, pending updates and other legal aspects. I would highly recommend Attorney Gary "Gene"  Britt who is an excellent lawyer for any legal obligations in the future and greatly suggest him to others seeking legal assistance. Also many thanks, to Attorney Britt's paralegal team for their outstanding telephone communications and other details of concerns.
Thank you Attorney Britt for your outstanding representation and the outcome of my case.
Need to improve few things, but still rated 5star,they accurate and for real

This law firm is the best! Thank you Mr. Poppy & his assistant Melissa for handling my case with compassion and kindness. I could always call Melissa and Kris was there anytime I needed to see him. It was a very serious case, thank God I had someone on my side that had patience with me and listened!

The Richardson Firm took my case for an automobile accident. A year later, October 2020, Matthew Richardson has made no progress because neither he nor his new paralegal (Daniela Campos) does their job...what so ever. Myself and my fiancé did ALL the leg work. (Literally) Even the simple things, like providing the police report for them because the law firm did not want to stay on top of the Fayetteville PD for providing the police report after 10 days from the accident. I won't blame the whole law firm, BUT, I know for a fact Matthew Richardson either doesn't like to do lawyer work, maybe he's lazy, or he doesn't know what he's doing. Either way, STAY AWAY FROM HIM...even Matthew himself admitted he found something out by hear-say because he was "Actually doing his job." REALLY! Thanks for wasting a whole year of my time when I could've been represented by a real lawyer at another law firm. AGAIN...STAY AWAY!!!

Extremely happy with my attorney, Gary "Gene" Britt for working with me every step of the way when my car was hit from behind. Their insurance was low budget and out of state- dragging out the process and confusing me with forms. Gene stepped in and was honest; listening to every detail. He was always available to me for any last minute questions and he was very knowledgable in the area. I could not have asked for better care. Thanks Gene, and the Richardson Law Firm.

I was facing a serious felony charge looking at 20 years. As soon as I stepped in the office, the staff were very polite and professional and took care of my case as if it was their own. I ended up walking away with a misdemeanor and a year probation. This law firm by hands down the best and at a reasonable price you can’t beat anywhere else. Thank you Richardson Law-Firm ,  and a special thanks to Kris Poppe.  I can enjoy life with my kids now.
review.review_reply: Thanks for your kind review.  It was a pleasure representing you.

review.comment: Patrick Anstead handled my legal issues with excellence and true customer service. Not only did he take care of everything for me, he ensured that I received the best outcome and cost for my issue. I highly recommend Patrick and The Richardson Firm!
Billy is one of my favorite people...however his associate  could of done a better job with maki g sure I had a clear deed back.
Good
I call , they did not return my call
Honest Christian people!
Call and tried to see if they would take my case and pretty much said they don't do small stuff money chasers smh.
Great firm and friendly staff.  I would HIGHLY recommend Mr. Poppe if you need an experienced trial Attoney to defend your right, especially dealing with MILITARY LAW UCMJ.

(Translated by Google) In 2018 I experienced an Act of Discrimination with a company that works for 24 years and injured both arms after consulting some Lawyers, they refused to help me but when I contacted Richardson Firm they immediately took my case, they explained step by step to close my case and I was very satisfied with that. I recommend Richardson Firm

(Original)
En el año 2018 experimente un Acto de Discriminación con una compañía que le trabaje por 24años me lesione ambos brazos después de consultar algunos Abogados se negaron a ayudarme pero cuando contacte a Richardson Firm de inmediato tomaron mi caso me explicaron pasó a paso a paso hasta cerrar mi caso y qude muy satisfecho por eso Yo Recomiendo a Richardson Firm
Top notch law firm. The best in Fayetteville!

Professional, friendly & quickly, handled my case in getting all pending charges dropped. Chandan & his team did a amazing job for a very affordable price. I highly recommend you contact them & see how they can help you.

Chandan Shankar did an excellent job. I received a ticket, 20 miles over the limit, which was thrown away. The process was quick and easy and I never had to miss work or take away from my personal schedule. I would highly recommend Chandan if you are looking for a professional and proficient attorney to represent you in your related legal matters.

I called this Firm last week to discuss a medical malpractice claim,the lady up front transferred me to a paralegal.The paralegal did not give me a chance to fully explain about my case after talking for a minute!The paralegal was VERY RUDE AND STATED TO ME THAT OUR LAW FIRM WILL NOT BE INTERESTED IN MY CASE!First of all how can a paralegal make a law firm decision whether are not they would take a case.She is Losing the law firm cases!!!By BEING RUDE AND MAKING DECISIONS FOR THE FIRM!
Great lawyers, great staff.

The Richardson Firm truly exceeded all my expectations with their expeditious handling of my particular case.  I really appreciate the Mr. Chandan Y. Shankar Attorney at Law.  I was amazed at how fast he resolved my court case at a more than reasonable rate.  Thank you all
Handle my case fast I couldn't be a happier person thanks to the Richardson firm.

Matt Richardson was extremely helpful in giving legal advice.  He had our best interest in mind.  He was detail oriented, and made us a priority. I highly recommend his practice for all legal matters big or small.
I can't share details but please trust me that I think Mr. Poppy did a great job in the military matter legal assistance was needed in.
I called on friday and by tuesday my case was dismissed. This firm is straight forward and gets the job done in a very timely manner. Thanks so much!

If I could rate at a 0 I would!  Called today for a simple SPEEDING ticket and this girl was CLUELESS! I couldn't get a single straight answer out of her about what would happen  and then to top it off she rushed me off the phone!  Unprofessional and just PLAIN RUDE!!! Don't waste your time with these people!!!!!
The conclusion of my case was more than expected...fantastic as a matter of fact. These guys are top notch! I am so thankful!
review.review_reply: It was a pleasure to help, Chris.  Thank you!

review.comment: Mr.poppe , is an all around nice man , and the baddest damn lawyer in Fayetteville. He saved my life. Thanks again mr.poppe!!! 😁
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review.  We couldn't agree more!

review.comment: The firm was very timely, polite and had amazing service. While offering a very reasonable price. Saved tons of money because of this amazing firm. Thank you all!
Handled my cases quickly and efficiently and everything worked out in my favor. Mr. Shankar and Ms. Burkert did an excellent job and I’m so grateful.
